properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Dyer, TN; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 1 at 11:39AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for the Mississippi River...
Mississippi River at Caruthersville affecting Mississippi...
Pemiscot...Dyer...Lake and Lauderdale Counties
Mississippi River at Osceola affecting Mississippi...Lauderdale
and Tipton Counties

The Flood Advisory continues for
the Mississippi River at Caruthersville
* until further notice.
* At 11 AM Wednesday the stage was 25.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above action stage Thursday night,
cresting near 32.0 feet Tuesday, January 7.
* At 32.0 feet...In Missouri, docks of the steel mill near Hickman
are flooding. In Tennessee, Mississippi River overbank flooding is
occurring across Highway 88 just north of Dee Webb Road. Extensive
amounts of Chickasaw National Wildlife Refuge are flooded. Sloughs
at the west end of Barr Road are beginning to back up into fields.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
